extension.description:
JSON-RPC interface currently accepted commands are 'color', 'effect' or 'clear'. Examples: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"Addons.ExecuteAddon", "params":{"addonid":"script.hyperion", "params":{"command":"color", "color":"green"}}}
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"Addons.ExecuteAddon", "params":{"addonid":"script.hyperion", "params":{"command":"effect", "effect":"Snake"}}}
